title: 2.3 Master Challenge 2
question: This challenge requires you to work in pairs. You and your teammate should make conflicting changes to the same program file. Each of you should attempt to merge your changes into the main branch, resulting in a merge conflict. You must resolve the merge conflict and successfully merge the changes.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
